front.title: •Panaka's Blaster
front.gametext: Deploy on Panaka. May target a character, creature, or vehicle for free. Draw destiny. Target hit if destiny +2 > defense value. When this blaster hits a character or vehicle in battle, your total power here is +3 for remainder of battle.
front.lore: Naboo blaster personally modified by Captain Panaka. Boosted by extra power packs that allow it to maintain sustained fire in tense situations.

combo: Panaka's Blaster + Captain Panaka + Crack Shot + Rebel Artillery If Panaka hits a character, the Dark Side will have to lose three Force and the character.
